name: lambda-js
description: Syntactic sugar for lambda one-liners in Javascript that doesn't include a performance penalty
author: David Ellis

scripts.prepublish: npm test && docco ./lib/lambda.js && uglifyjs ./lib/lambda.js > ./lib/lambda.min.js && git commit -am "Automatic doc and minification for version $npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
